text: Stewart Forsyth (born 26 October 1961) is a Scottish footballer, who played for Arbroath, Dundee and Montrose. ==External links== * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Scottish footballers Category:Arbroath F.C. players Category:Dundee F.C. players Category:Montrose F.C. players Category:Carnoustie Panmure F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players
title: Stewart Forsyth
